name: Header
description: Component that represents the header of the page

name: Footer
description: Component that represents the footer of the page

name: Navbar
description: Main navigation bar of the page

name: Sidebar
description: Side navigation bar on the page

name: LoginForm
description: Login form for users

name: SignUpForm
description: Registration form for new users

name: Primary Button
description: Primary button used for highlighted actions

name: Secondary Button
description: Secondary button for less prominent actions

name: Toggle On
description: Switch to represent the activated state of a property

name: Toggle Off
description: Switch to represent the deactivated state of a property

name: Carousel
description: Sliding component to dynamically display content

name: Warning Alert
description: Visual alert for warning messages

name: Error Alert
description: Visual alert for error messages

name: Success Alert
description: Visual alert for success or confirmation messages

name: SearchBar 1
description: Search bar for search functionality

name: SearchBar 2
description: Second variant of the search bar

name: Date Picker
description: Date selector to facilitate date selection

name: ProgressBar
description: Progress bar to indicate the progress of a task

name: Dashboard
description: Main panel showing charts, summaries, and quick access to functionalities

name: Settings Panel
description: Configuration panel for settings and preferences

name: Payment Form
description: Form for entering payment information

name: Order History
description: User's history of orders and transactions

name: Task List
description: List of pending or to-do tasks

name: Chat Window
description: Chat window for real-time communication
